item.title: Pay Gap Analysis within Sustainability and Climate-Related Fields - 1-3
item.description:
Pay Gap Analysis within Sustainability and Climate-Related Fields Link to heading

The aim of this section is to measure wage disparities among different demographic groups (e.g., BIPOC vs. White, Male vs. Female) within the clean energy workforce. The analysis seeks to identify whether pay gaps exist and to determine which groups are most disadvantaged.

  • Methodology

  • Data Sources

    • U.S. Energy & Employment Report (USEER): Median wage by demographic.
    • Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS): Wage distributions by occupation and demographic group.
    • Department of Energy (DOE) reports on wage equity and workforce representation.

  • Data Processing
